vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Planned Development District for an open-enrollment charter school use and R-7.5(A) Single Family District uses on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the north side of R.L. Thornton Freeway (Interstate Highway 30), east of North Buckner Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Denial
Z201-130(LG)
